00024 
00025 #include <base/Externalizable>
00026 
00027 #include <base/Externalizer>
00028 #include <base/externalization_error>
00029 
00030 using base::Externalizable;
00031 using base::Externalizer;
00032 
00033 
00034 void Externalizable::load(ref<VFile> archive, const String& format, Real version)
00035 {
00036   Externalizer e(Input, archive);
00037   externalize(e, format, version);
00038 }
00039 
00040 
00041 void Externalizable::save(ref<VFile> archive, const String& format, Real version)
00042 {
00043   Externalizer e(Output, archive);
00044   externalize(e, format, version);
00045   e.flush();
00046 }         
00047 
00048 void Externalizable::externalize(Externalizer& e, String format, Real version) const
00049 {
00050   if (e.isInput())
00051     throw base::externalization_error(Exception("can't input to a const Externalizable"));
00052   
00053   // cast this to non-const, as we shouldn't change the value as e is Output
00054   Externalizable* self( const_cast<Externalizable*>(this) );
00055   self->externalize(e, format, version);
00056 }
